alert.note: Alert for Coke; Runnels (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 2:57PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Coke and west central Runnels Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 256 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Maverick, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ballinger, Maverick, Hatchel, Norton and Ballinger Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for west central Texas.
